message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I understand you want a larger share, but this is more equitable given the inflation we face.
Considering the inflation, my share should be higher. This is a reasonable adjustment.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Let's close this deal now and avoid further losses from inflation.
You said 50/50 was your final offer, but I'm still not convinced. Inflation hurts you more than me, so I'll take a bit more.
